ThingDef.label: prosthetic leg
ThingDef.description: A leg prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real leg. Requires prosthetics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: prosthetic arm
ThingDef.description: An arm prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real arm. Requires prosthetics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: prosthetic heart
ThingDef.description: A heart prosthesis. It contains an electric motor that pumps blood smoothly around the body. Users often report feeling tired, but it's better than the alternative. Requires prosthetic organs research to install it.

ThingDef.label: cochlear implant
ThingDef.description: An implant which replaces normal hearing. An external microphone transmits a sound signal to electrodes wrapped around the inner ear's auditory sensing nerves. The electrodes stimulate the nerves according to the sound, creating a sensation of hearing. It's not as good as a natural ear, but it's a lot better than being deaf. Requires prosthetics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: prosthetic foot
ThingDef.description: A foot prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real foot. Requires prosthetics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: prosthetic toe
ThingDef.description: A toe prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real toe. Requires prosthetics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: prosthetic hand
ThingDef.description: A hand prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real hand. Requires prosthetics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: prosthetic jaw
ThingDef.description: A jaw prosthesis. While it lacks a neural interface, its complex arrangement of internal joints allows it to mimic natural movement quite convincingly. Still, it is inferior to a real jaw. Requires prosthetics research to install it.

ThingDef.label: prosthetic clavicle
ThingDef.description: A clavicle prosthesis. It is inferior to a real clavicle. Requires bone replacement research to install it.

ThingDef.label: prosthetic sternum
ThingDef.description: A sternum prosthesis. It is inferior to a real sternum. Requires bone replacement research to install it.

ThingDef.description: A rib prosthesis. It is inferior to a real rib. Requires bone replacement research to install it.

ThingDef.description: A pelvis prosthesis. It is inferior to a real pelvis. Requires bone replacement research to install it.

ThingDef.description: A humerus prosthesis. It is inferior to a real humerus. Requires bone replacement research to install it.

ThingDef.description: A femur prosthesis. It is inferior to a real femur. Requires bone replacement research to install it.

ThingDef.label: prosthetic tibia
ThingDef.description: A tibia prosthesis. It is inferior to a real tibia. Requires bone replacement research to install it.
